page.description: Fires when the user swipes (left, right, up or down) on a row in the List.

argument.name: ele
argument.description: The element that contains the data.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: swipeDirection
property.description: The direction that the user swips (left, right, up, down.)

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: A zero-based row number that the user swipd.

discussion.p: In addition the Javascript can reference the 'this' scope, a pointer to the List object.
